**魔法抵抗斗篷**（cloak of magic resistance，通常简称作**CoMR**）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[斗篷](/wiki/%E6%96%97%E7%AF%B7 "斗篷")类[防具](/wiki/%E9%98%B2%E5%85%B7 "防具")。它是一种由[布](/index.php?title=%E5%B8%83\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "布 (page does not exist)")制成的[魔法](/index.php?title=%E9%AD%94%E6%B3%95%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "魔法物品 (page does not exist)")斗篷，未[鉴定](/index.php?title=%E9%89%B4%E5%AE%9A\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "鉴定 (page does not exist)")时外观是[随机](/index.php?title=%E9%9A%8F%E6%9C%BA%E5%A4%96%E8%A7%82\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "随机外观 (page does not exist)")的[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)。

## 生成

[巫师](/index.php?title=%E5%B7%AB%E5%B8%88\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "巫师 (page does not exist)")在游戏开始时会获得一件+0魔法抵抗斗篷[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)。

[阵营祭司](/index.php?title=%E9%98%B5%E8%90%A5%E7%A5%AD%E5%8F%B8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "阵营祭司 (page does not exist)")、[高阶祭司](/index.php?title=%E9%AB%98%E9%98%B6%E7%A5%AD%E5%8F%B8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "高阶祭司 (page does not exist)")和[大祭司](/index.php?title=%E5%A4%A7%E7%A5%AD%E5%8F%B8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "大祭司 (page does not exist)")生成时有1⁄21的概率[获得](/index.php?title=%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "怪物起始物品 (page does not exist)")一件魔法抵抗斗篷[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)。[凯恩大师](/index.php?title=%E5%87%AF%E6%81%A9%E5%A4%A7%E5%B8%88\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "凯恩大师 (page does not exist)")生成时有1⁄11的概率获得一件魔法抵抗斗篷[\[4\]](#cite_note-4)。

非[僧侣](/index.php?title=%E5%83%A7%E4%BE%A3%EF%BC%88%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "僧侣（玩家怪物） (page does not exist)")职业的[玩家怪物](/index.php?title=%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "玩家怪物 (page does not exist)")生成时有7⁄64（约10.94%）的概率获得一件魔法抵抗斗篷[\[5\]](#cite_note-5)[\[6\]](#cite_note-6)；对于[牧师](/index.php?title=%E7%89%A7%E5%B8%88%EF%BC%88%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "牧师（玩家怪物） (page does not exist)")玩家怪物，该斗篷有3⁄4的概率被替换成长袍，因此他们获得魔法抵抗斗篷的概率仅有约2.73%[\[7\]](#cite_note-7)；[巫师](/index.php?title=%E5%B7%AB%E5%B8%88%EF%BC%88%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "巫师（玩家怪物） (page does not exist)")玩家怪物的斗篷则有1⁄2的概率被替换成魔法抵抗斗篷，因此他们获得魔法抵抗斗篷的总概率约是43.75%[\[8\]](#cite_note-8)。

## 描述

魔法抵抗斗篷的基础[AC](/index.php?title=AC/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "AC/zh-CN (page does not exist)")加成为1，且能提供[MC1](/index.php?title=%E9%94%80%E9%AD%94\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "销魔 (page does not exist)")和[魔法抵抗](/index.php?title=%E9%AD%94%E6%B3%95%E6%8A%B5%E6%8A%97\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "魔法抵抗 (page does not exist)")特质。

## 策略

魔法抵抗斗篷可以成为[飞升套件](/index.php?title=%E9%A3%9E%E5%8D%87%E5%A5%97%E4%BB%B6\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "飞升套件 (page does not exist)")的重要组成部分，经常与[银龙鳞甲](/wiki/%E9%93%B6%E9%BE%99%E9%B3%9E%E7%94%B2 "银龙鳞甲")（或其他[反射](/index.php?title=%E5%8F%8D%E5%B0%84\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "反射 (page does not exist)")来源）搭配使用，以防御各种形式的攻击（例如[诅咒物品](/index.php?title=%E8%AF%85%E5%92%92%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "诅咒物品 (page does not exist)")等怪物法术，以及各种魔杖和吐息攻击）。银龙甲+魔抗斗篷的组合对于部分后期玩法来说是非常实用的选择，因为它可以省下用于其他作用的装备槽位：护身符槽位可以戴[复活护身符](/wiki/%E5%A4%8D%E6%B4%BB%E6%8A%A4%E8%BA%AB%E7%AC%A6 "复活护身符")、多出来的一只手可以持握[两把武器](/index.php?title=%E5%8F%8C%E6%AD%A6%E5%99%A8%E6%88%98%E6%96%97\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "双武器战斗 (page does not exist)")或双手武器，或者给缺少长袍或[保护斗篷](/wiki/%E4%BF%9D%E6%8A%A4%E6%96%97%E7%AF%B7 "保护斗篷")的施法者穿戴[小盾牌](/wiki/%E5%B0%8F%E7%9B%BE%E7%89%8C "小盾牌")。魔法抵抗斗篷也能作为当你的[任务神器](/index.php?title=%E4%BB%BB%E5%8A%A1%E7%A5%9E%E5%99%A8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "任务神器 (page does not exist)")被窃取的时候的后备魔抗来源。

挑战[无许愿](/index.php?title=%E6%97%A0%E8%AE%B8%E6%84%BF\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "无许愿 (page does not exist)")、不使用神器，或不穿戴铠甲的僧侣可以考虑使用魔法抵抗斗篷。

### 鉴定

魔法抵抗斗篷是唯一一种穿戴或发挥效果时不会[自动鉴定](/index.php?title=%E8%87%AA%E5%8A%A8%E9%89%B4%E5%AE%9A\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "自动鉴定 (page does not exist)")的[随机外观](/index.php?title=%E9%9A%8F%E6%9C%BA%E5%A4%96%E8%A7%82\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "随机外观 (page does not exist)")斗篷，因此非正式地鉴定它很容易。[隐形](/index.php?title=%E9%9A%90%E5%BD%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "隐形 (page does not exist)")的玩家可能要考虑暂时解除隐形状态来鉴定斗篷，因为[隐身斗篷](/wiki/%E9%9A%90%E8%BA%AB%E6%96%97%E7%AF%B7 "隐身斗篷")在你已经隐形时不会自动鉴定。由巫师留下的[骨档](/index.php?title=%E9%AA%A8%E6%A1%A3\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "骨档 (page does not exist)")通常可以找到魔法抵抗斗篷。

魔法抵抗斗篷的基础价是60 zm，与隐身斗篷相同。进行[价格鉴定](/index.php?title=%E4%BB%B7%E6%A0%BC%E9%89%B4%E5%AE%9A\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "价格鉴定 (page does not exist)")时，你也需要想办法解除其他来源的隐形来区分两种斗篷。

还有一些风险更高的鉴定方法：移除所有其他来源的魔法抵抗，然后触发[反魔法区域](/index.php?title=%E5%8F%8D%E9%AD%94%E6%B3%95%E5%8C%BA%E5%9F%9F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "反魔法区域 (page does not exist)")或[传送陷阱](/index.php?title=%E4%BC%A0%E9%80%81%E9%99%B7%E9%98%B1\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "传送陷阱 (page does not exist)")；如果你AC足够低，你也可以把[冲击魔杖](/index.php?title=%E5%86%B2%E5%87%BB%E9%AD%94%E6%9D%96\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "冲击魔杖 (page does not exist)")交给敌对怪物让它用魔杖攻击你。只要你有魔抗，陷阱或魔杖的效果会被完全抵消。使用[启蒙药水](/wiki/%E5%90%AF%E8%92%99%E8%8D%AF%E6%B0%B4 "启蒙药水")或[启蒙魔杖](/index.php?title=%E5%90%AF%E8%92%99%E9%AD%94%E6%9D%96\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "启蒙魔杖 (page does not exist)")更安全，但这两类物品比较难获取。

### 战斗

敌对的阵营祭司有概率拥有魔抗斗篷，这对于试图规避其法术并消灭他们的玩家而言是很大的威胁，因为很多高效的远程攻击手段都会被魔抗抵消，但[远程武器](/wiki/%E8%BF%9C%E7%A8%8B%E6%AD%A6%E5%99%A8 "远程武器")、宠物和投掷药水依然有用。

类似地，如果凯恩大师带着魔抗斗篷，他会免疫[死亡魔杖](/index.php?title=%E6%AD%BB%E4%BA%A1%E9%AD%94%E6%9D%96\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "死亡魔杖 (page does not exist)")的效果，从而使得打败他的难度增加。但是，魔法抵抗并不能抵消元素攻击的效果。[自己变形](/index.php?title=%E5%8F%98%E5%BD%A2%E8%87%AA%E8%BA%AB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "变形自身 (page does not exist)")成[黑龙](/index.php?title=%E9%BB%91%E9%BE%99\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "黑龙 (page does not exist)")或利用黑龙宠物的[分解](/index.php?title=%E5%88%86%E8%A7%A3\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "分解 (page does not exist)")射线也可以解决他，因为魔法抵抗也不能抵消分解效果。

对于多数玩家，最坏的情况是摩洛的高阶祭司生成时拥有魔抗斗篷——死亡魔杖不再管用，你通常需要冒着风险近距离攻击他。

## 历史

魔法抵抗斗篷最初于[NetHack 3.0.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.0 "NetHack 3.0.0")加入游戏。在[NetHack 3.4.3](/wiki/NetHack_3.4.3 "NetHack 3.4.3")及更早版本，魔法抵抗斗篷能提供[MC3](/index.php?title=%E9%94%80%E9%AD%94%EF%BC%883.4.3%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "销魔（3.4.3） (page does not exist)")。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Cloak_of_magic_resistance/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

Many variants based on NetHack 3.4.3 and earlier versions give the cloak of magic resistance MC3.

### SLASH'EM

In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), the cloak of magic resistance gives MC3. A cloak of magic resistance can be created by [upgrading](/wiki/Upgrading "Upgrading") an [elven cloak](/wiki/Elven_cloak "Elven cloak") or [oilskin cloak](/wiki/Oilskin_cloak "Oilskin cloak"), with a 1⁄4 chance; this makes it less common as a wish, especially for [gnome](/wiki/Gnome_\(starting_race\) "Gnome (starting race)") characters (who always have access to the [tinker](/wiki/Tinker "Tinker") [technique](/wiki/Technique "Technique")).

[Undead](/wiki/Undead "Undead") [vampires](/wiki/Vampire_\(monster_class\) "Vampire (monster class)") are often generated with [opera cloaks](/wiki/Opera_cloak "Opera cloak") - while this can provide a reliable source of backup cloaks if their appearance is randomized to this, it will also give spellcasting-reliant characters significant trouble with killing vampires, especially in the case of the already-powerful [vampire mages](/wiki/Vampire_mage "Vampire mage").

### GruntHack

In [GruntHack](/wiki/GruntHack "GruntHack"), [Sokoban](/index.php?title=Sokoban_\(GruntHack\)\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Sokoban (GruntHack) (page does not exist)") offers a cloak of magic resistance as one of three possible prizes.

An ideal wish for a cloak of magic resistance in GruntHack is "blessed greased fixed +3 [dragonhide](/wiki/Dragonhide "Dragonhide") cloak of magic resistance and reflection", which covers MC3 alongside two of the most essential properties in a single slot. Monsters are also capable of making wishes, and may wish for a cloak of magic resistance unless they already possess magic resistance.

### NetHack brass

In [NetHack brass](/wiki/NetHack_brass "NetHack brass"), a cloak of magic resistance is one of the three possible [Sokoban](/wiki/Sokoban "Sokoban") prize items.

### UnNetHack

In [UnNetHack](/wiki/UnNetHack "UnNetHack"), [Sokoban](/wiki/Sokoban_\(UnNetHack\) "Sokoban (UnNetHack)") offers a cloak as one of the three prize types, which has a 1⁄2 chance of being a cloak of magic resistance. The [Executioner](/wiki/Executioner "Executioner") will always be generated with one.

### dNetHack

In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"), the cloak does not grant any base [AC](/wiki/AC "AC") or [damage reduction](/wiki/DR "DR"), but still provides magic resistance and MC3.

Human [Anachrononauts](/wiki/Anachrononaut "Anachrononaut") start each game with a cloak of magic resistance. [Doctor Archer](/index.php?title=Doctor_Archer\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Doctor Archer (page does not exist)"), the [Madman](/wiki/Madman "Madman") quest nemesis, will always generate with a cloak of magic resistance. [Xorn monks](/wiki/Xorn_monk "Xorn monk") have a 1⁄50 chance of generating with a cloak of magic resistance in their size.

[The Mantle of Heaven](/wiki/The_Mantle_of_Heaven "The Mantle of Heaven") and [The Vestment of Hell](/wiki/The_Vestment_of_Hell "The Vestment of Hell") are [quest artifacts](/wiki/Quest_artifact "Quest artifact") for the [Noble](/wiki/Noble "Noble") that each have a cloak with a randomized appearance as their [base item](/wiki/Base_item "Base item"), making it possible for one of them to be a cloak of magic resistance. The Mantle of Heaven appears as an ornamental cope and is given to [human](/wiki/Human_\(starting_race\) "Human (starting race)") and [incantifier](/wiki/Incantifier_\(starting_race\) "Incantifier (starting race)") Nobles, while The Vestment appears as an opera cloak and is given to [vampiric](/wiki/Vampire_\(starting_race_in_dNetHack\) "Vampire (starting race in dNetHack)") Nobles.

### FIQHack

In [FIQHack](/wiki/FIQHack "FIQHack"), the cloak of magic resistance grants MC2 while worn.

### xNetHack

In [xNetHack](/wiki/XNetHack "XNetHack"), [Anaraxis the Black](/wiki/Anaraxis_the_Black "Anaraxis the Black") (renamed from The Dark One, the [Wizard quest](/wiki/Wizard_quest "Wizard quest") nemesis) always generates wearing a cloak of magic resistance.

### EvilHack

In [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), [giant](/wiki/Giant_\(starting_race\) "Giant (starting race)") and [tortle](/wiki/Tortle_\(starting_race\) "Tortle (starting race)") Wizards are given an [amulet of magic resistance](/wiki/Amulet_of_magic_resistance "Amulet of magic resistance") in place of the cloak of magic resistance, which they are too large to wear.

The Dark One will always generate wearing a cloak of magic resistance, and [Kathryn the Ice Queen](/wiki/Kathryn_the_Ice_Queen "Kathryn the Ice Queen") has a 1⁄2 chance of generating with one. Cloaks of magic resistance will occasionally generate in the initial kits of level 20 player monsters, minus giants and tortles.

Dragonhide cloaks of magic resistance are a popular wish for characters that can wear them, since it grants high AC and resists most forms of erosion - the revamped [destroy armor](/wiki/Destroy_armor_\(monster_spell\) "Destroy armor (monster spell)") [monster spell](/wiki/Monster_spell "Monster spell") can still deteriorate it, but only by one stage at a time due to the magic resistance.

### SlashTHEM

In addition to SLASH'EM details, [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM") also adds The Mantle of Heaven and The Vestment of Hell as Noble quest artifacts, which have a chance of their randomized appearance being a cloak of magic resistance. Incantifier Wizards have their starting cloak of magic resistance replaced with [robes](/wiki/Robe_\(SLASH%27EM\) "Robe (SLASH'EM)").

魔法抵抗斗篷
外观 随机
装备槽位 斗篷
AC 1
特殊效果

基础价 60 zm
重量 10
材料 布

魔法抵抗斗篷（cloak of magic resistance，通常简称作CoMR）是NetHack中的一种斗篷类防具。它是一种由布制成的魔法斗篷，未鉴定时外观是随机的[1]。

Contents

  • 1 生成
  • 2 描述
  • 3 策略
    • 3.1 鉴定
    • 3.2 战斗
  • 4 历史
  • 5 Variants
    • 5.1 SLASH'EM
    • 5.2 GruntHack
    • 5.3 NetHack brass
    • 5.4 UnNetHack
    • 5.5 dNetHack
    • 5.6 FIQHack
    • 5.7 xNetHack
    • 5.8 EvilHack
    • 5.9 SlashTHEM
  • 6 引用及注释

生成

巫师在游戏开始时会获得一件+0魔法抵抗斗篷[2]。

阵营祭司、高阶祭司和大祭司生成时有1⁄21的概率获得一件魔法抵抗斗篷[3]。凯恩大师生成时有1⁄11的概率获得一件魔法抵抗斗篷[4]。

非僧侣职业的玩家怪物生成时有7⁄64（约10.94%）的概率获得一件魔法抵抗斗篷[5][6]；对于牧师玩家怪物，该斗篷有3⁄4的概率被替换成长袍，因此他们获得魔法抵抗斗篷的概率仅有约2.73%[7]；巫师玩家怪物的斗篷则有1⁄2的概率被替换成魔法抵抗斗篷，因此他们获得魔法抵抗斗篷的总概率约是43.75%[8]。

描述

魔法抵抗斗篷的基础AC加成为1，且能提供MC1和魔法抵抗特质。

策略

魔法抵抗斗篷可以成为飞升套件的重要组成部分，经常与银龙鳞甲（或其他反射来源）搭配使用，以防御各种形式的攻击（例如诅咒物品等怪物法术，以及各种魔杖和吐息攻击）。银龙甲+魔抗斗篷的组合对于部分后期玩法来说是非常实用的选择，因为它可以省下用于其他作用的装备槽位：护身符槽位可以戴复活护身符、多出来的一只手可以持握两把武器或双手武器，或者给缺少长袍或保护斗篷的施法者穿戴小盾牌。魔法抵抗斗篷也能作为当你的任务神器被窃取的时候的后备魔抗来源。

挑战无许愿、不使用神器，或不穿戴铠甲的僧侣可以考虑使用魔法抵抗斗篷。

鉴定

魔法抵抗斗篷是唯一一种穿戴或发挥效果时不会自动鉴定的随机外观斗篷，因此非正式地鉴定它很容易。隐形的玩家可能要考虑暂时解除隐形状态来鉴定斗篷，因为隐身斗篷在你已经隐形时不会自动鉴定。由巫师留下的骨档通常可以找到魔法抵抗斗篷。

魔法抵抗斗篷的基础价是60 zm，与隐身斗篷相同。进行价格鉴定时，你也需要想办法解除其他来源的隐形来区分两种斗篷。

还有一些风险更高的鉴定方法：移除所有其他来源的魔法抵抗，然后触发反魔法区域或传送陷阱；如果你AC足够低，你也可以把冲击魔杖交给敌对怪物让它用魔杖攻击你。只要你有魔抗，陷阱或魔杖的效果会被完全抵消。使用启蒙药水或启蒙魔杖更安全，但这两类物品比较难获取。

战斗

敌对的阵营祭司有概率拥有魔抗斗篷，这对于试图规避其法术并消灭他们的玩家而言是很大的威胁，因为很多高效的远程攻击手段都会被魔抗抵消，但远程武器、宠物和投掷药水依然有用。

类似地，如果凯恩大师带着魔抗斗篷，他会免疫死亡魔杖的效果，从而使得打败他的难度增加。但是，魔法抵抗并不能抵消元素攻击的效果。自己变形成黑龙或利用黑龙宠物的分解射线也可以解决他，因为魔法抵抗也不能抵消分解效果。

对于多数玩家，最坏的情况是摩洛的高阶祭司生成时拥有魔抗斗篷——死亡魔杖不再管用，你通常需要冒着风险近距离攻击他。

历史

魔法抵抗斗篷最初于NetHack 3.0.0加入游戏。在NetHack 3.4.3及更早版本，魔法抵抗斗篷能提供MC3。

Variants

此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。
您可以帮助我们翻译此页面，但请勿使用机器翻译。

Many variants based on NetHack 3.4.3 and earlier versions give the cloak of magic resistance MC3.

SLASH'EM

In SLASH'EM, the cloak of magic resistance gives MC3. A cloak of magic resistance can be created by upgrading an elven cloak or oilskin cloak, with a 1⁄4 chance; this makes it less common as a wish, especially for gnome characters (who always have access to the tinker technique).

Undead vampires are often generated with opera cloaks - while this can provide a reliable source of backup cloaks if their appearance is randomized to this, it will also give spellcasting-reliant characters significant trouble with killing vampires, especially in the case of the already-powerful vampire mages.

GruntHack

In GruntHack, Sokoban offers a cloak of magic resistance as one of three possible prizes.

An ideal wish for a cloak of magic resistance in GruntHack is "blessed greased fixed +3 dragonhide cloak of magic resistance and reflection", which covers MC3 alongside two of the most essential properties in a single slot. Monsters are also capable of making wishes, and may wish for a cloak of magic resistance unless they already possess magic resistance.

NetHack brass

In NetHack brass, a cloak of magic resistance is one of the three possible Sokoban prize items.

UnNetHack

In UnNetHack, Sokoban offers a cloak as one of the three prize types, which has a 1⁄2 chance of being a cloak of magic resistance. The Executioner will always be generated with one.

dNetHack

In dNetHack, the cloak does not grant any base AC or damage reduction, but still provides magic resistance and MC3.

Human Anachrononauts start each game with a cloak of magic resistance. Doctor Archer, the Madman quest nemesis, will always generate with a cloak of magic resistance. Xorn monks have a 1⁄50 chance of generating with a cloak of magic resistance in their size.

The Mantle of Heaven and The Vestment of Hell are quest artifacts for the Noble that each have a cloak with a randomized appearance as their base item, making it possible for one of them to be a cloak of magic resistance. The Mantle of Heaven appears as an ornamental cope and is given to human and incantifier Nobles, while The Vestment appears as an opera cloak and is given to vampiric Nobles.

FIQHack

In FIQHack, the cloak of magic resistance grants MC2 while worn.

xNetHack

In xNetHack, Anaraxis the Black (renamed from The Dark One, the Wizard quest nemesis) always generates wearing a cloak of magic resistance.

EvilHack

In EvilHack, giant and tortle Wizards are given an amulet of magic resistance in place of the cloak of magic resistance, which they are too large to wear.

The Dark One will always generate wearing a cloak of magic resistance, and Kathryn the Ice Queen has a 1⁄2 chance of generating with one. Cloaks of magic resistance will occasionally generate in the initial kits of level 20 player monsters, minus giants and tortles.

Dragonhide cloaks of magic resistance are a popular wish for characters that can wear them, since it grants high AC and resists most forms of erosion - the revamped destroy armor monster spell can still deteriorate it, but only by one stage at a time due to the magic resistance.

SlashTHEM

In addition to SLASH'EM details, SlashTHEM also adds The Mantle of Heaven and The Vestment of Hell as Noble quest artifacts, which have a chance of their randomized appearance being a cloak of magic resistance. Incantifier Wizards have their starting cloak of magic resistance replaced with robes.
